short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A modern dark mode theme for the Google Suite

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to GSuiteDM - the ultimate dark mode solution for the Google Suite. With its sleek and intuitive design, our extension offers a seamless and customizable dark mode experience that perfectly complements your productivity needs. Say goodbye to eye strain and hello to enhanced focus with GSuiteDM. Though currently in beta, our extension already fully supports Google Docs, and we are constantly expanding our compatibility to include other Google Suite applications. Join our community of satisfied users and experience the difference GSuiteDM can make in your workday.
